description: This is a Kotlin source file for an Android application's main activity. It defines the MainActivity class, which manages UI components for selecting a machine learning model and a video file, and initiates processing. The code includes intent handling, permission management, UI updates, and integration with a ModelManager class for model operations.
external_files: R (resources, including layouts, string resources, and IDs)
